title: Why Only Eating When Hungry Is Hard
itunes:title: Why Only Eating When Hungry Is Hard
description:
Get the Free Course here:
http://phit.click/freecourse

Today we talk about hunger. So many of my clients think being hungry is hard or even scary.

They avoid hunger and eat in response to feeling lonely, wanting to relax, because the food is free, or because they are tired.

In this podcast we talk about all the reasons why we are afraid to get a little hungry and what happens when we actually allow ourselves to get hungry and just not eat.
